q: Watch: David Letterman on His Heart Surgery Chuck Ludlam and his wife Paula Hirshoff say the Peace Corps has lost its way since its founding by John F. Kennedy 50 years ago. We're sad about it but we're also angry about it, Ludlam told ABC News, ''because the people in these countries need our help. And the Peace Corps could be a great force for good in the world in terms of development assistance.'' Ludlam

's closing price Thursday, will lower Eric Schmidt 's stake and voting power, and comes as Google Inc. announced that co-founder Larry Page will replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive. Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman in April, Russolillo reports. ''The stock-trading plan, unveiled in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, said Eric Schmidt intends to sell as much as 534,000 Class A shares during the course of the year. I need more exclusives and I need it to be self-generated stuff. The two men do not discuss phone hacking, but Dispatches says other recordings exist which ''might provide damning evidence''.
